title: When will be the next project fiora sale
body: I want to kno when the sale for project fiora is

replies.body:
Riot doesn't give official data or dates for this, but there happens to be a fan made spreadsheet that can forecast most sales to within a few weeks. You can find it [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1T5h1LKTRCVg3NU9XA3NSlrGS1dF5YO6KfEePIL893SU/edit?toomany=true#gid=0) if you're interested.

**PROJECT Fiora** is predicted to be 203 days away from going on sale.
